fatality.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a death in an accident or a violent attack
fatality.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a 50% increase in the number of traffic fatalities
fatality.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the fact that a disease is certain to cause death
fatality.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The most serious form of skin cancer has a 30 percent fatality rate.
fatality.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the feeling that you cannot control what happens to you
